unnormalised: Boro, tor hea xevttachea lokhsankhya ankdeanche vixim mahiti asa, lokanno! Sorkaranuch provizhnal data uzvaddaila, ani thodde borech ruchiche nhixkarshan asat.
normalised: Bore, tor haka sodanchim naktinchi ankdevari, lokanno! Sorkaranuch priviznal datha ugtaile, ani kiteak tori intresttin vatt'ta.

unnormalised: Poile suvater, Bharotachi lokhsankhya odhikrutpanan 140 crore-acho ankdo vollonddla. To 1.4 billion lok! Tumhi kalpona korunk xoktat? Mhaka ugddas asa tea disani, ami sumar 80 crore asle, kiteak mhonnlear odikuch unne. Tem soglem sonvsar hanga asat toxem asa!
normalised: Poileach, Bharotachi lokhsankhya adhikrutpanan eka shambhrak ani challis krorank palun geli asa. Thanch ek point char billion lokh! Tumi kalpna korunk zata? Mhaka distha, thoddea disa uprant, amkam att'trak kroram asat, bore zale tor te kamiy zale. Taka dista ki heach jagyanuch asat!

unnormalised: 2023 chi gannti sumar 1.2% dor vorsak vaddicher dakoita. Atam, tem lhan dista, punn tumi 140 cr-achem bes gheun deal kortat tedna, ek lhan percentage-chi vaddi sumar lokanchi zamboltta vaddaita. Distam tem, odhikari 2011 chea lokhsankhyak ankdeanchi tulna kortat, zannem unch dor dakhoilo.
normalised: Don hazar ani tevis count dakhaita ki ek point don percent prati varshak vadhhicho dar. Atam, tem tor ekdom kamiy zata, punn tumi sodanchim eka shambhrak ani challis kroram sangati korunk sodta, ekdam kamiy percent vaddhtana ani kiteak lokanchi vadhh zata. Distta ki, offisha don hazar ani ekaudanchim count compare kortat, zaka unch dar dakhovla.

unnormalised: Ling gunnot'tor azun thodem vatten asat, mhaka aikuk ailem, sumar deshabharan 1000 dadleank 930 bailo. Kerala ani Tamil Nadu sarkhem thodem rajy Haryana ani UP sarkhea rajeam poros bore kortat disotat, zantunt gunnot'tor chintacho vishay asa, analyseram pormannem.
normalised: Sex ratio kitench zallo asa, mhakang dista, lagbagh nau shambra ani tevis femelis prati ek hazarak meles deshacherean. Kiteak state-um, Kerala ani Tamil Nadu dista ki te Haryana ani U-P sarki rajyankarun zaitin bare kortat, zachen ratio concern kortat, analyist's promann.

unnormalised: Saksharta dor vaddleat, devak dhanyavad. Ami sumar eka dashkant poilim 72% asle tea bodlek atam lokhsankhyentle 78% sakshar zalele polletat. Punn azun lamb vatter vochpak asa, sori? Khas korun tumhi gramin ilake ani bail choleanche xikxonnacho vichar kortana.
normalised: Literacy rates unch aile asa, dhanyavad. Tumi distata ki satyattrat percent lokh literate asat sadhanchim sattar percent dakhovta eka dashkak purvi. Pun te khup lamb vatt asa, bore zale tor? Visheshpanan tumi gavanim ani chiklichem shiksha vishayi dhyan divop.

unnormalised: Xeri vikasanui vadh zata. Odik ani odik lok gamvanthun xherani nokreo ani bori sondhi sodpak yetat, xeri ilakyant atam deshatlea lokhsankhyetllem sumar 35% jinn jiyetat, 2011-nt 31% asle. Mumbai ani Delhi fokot ubhonddtale, tumhi zannat?
normalised: Urbanization vadhhtana asa. Adhik ani adhik lokh gavanim shaharank cholta zhagde-dhandiyanchim sodhunani uttam sandhichim sodun, urban area atam lagbagh pachhtris percent desachim lokh rakhita compared sadhanchim ektrisha percent don hazar ani ekaudanim. Mumbai ani Delhi chalu asa, tumkang zanni asa?

unnormalised: Thodde pradeshik asmonataui asat. Uttarent thodde rajy dakhinentlea rajeam poros unch vegaar vaddot asat. Udahoronn khatir, Bihar ani Uttar Pradesh-ak, Kerala poros unch vadiche dor asat, zannem lagich bodli pangat zoddla.
normalised: Thancheam regional disparities asa. Kiteak state-um uthrani vadhhtana asa kiteak dakshini sarktani. Bihar ani Uttar Pradesh, udaharanak, unch vadhhti darasa compared Kerala sarka state-nk, zachen nivrutton darak palun asa.

unnormalised: Ho soglem data provizhnal asa, sorv dakhlo pormanne. Nimnne ankde 2025-26 khepeak odik detailant analysis ani verification zalea uprant bhair poddtelet. Punn, atanchi, hea survatekchea ankdeamni mhaka ami khuxil'le distat ani fuddleant konnteo aavdhani asat tem sangta, sori?
normalised: He sodanchim data priviznal asa, bore zale tor. Final numbers don hazar ani panchvis slash don hazar ani satvisnim yenar zaitin analiz korunani verify kele uprant. Pun, atam, he porichache number kitench uttam vichar ditha, zachen ammi asat ani kiteak chelnj lay asa pori, bore zale tor?
